invalid_format.title: Invalid Format
invalid_format.description:
Invalid date format specified. Use the following format: `DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm PM`.

**Example**
```{0}```

date_before_now.title: Invalid Date
date_before_now.description: The specified date is in the past

date_before_start.title: Invalid Date
date_before_start.description: The specified date is before the start date

date_after_end.title: Invalid Date
date_after_end.description: The specified date is after the end date
